answer: The study of R Coronae Borealis stars in the Large Magellanic Cloud is motivated by the discovery of new RCB stars using the MACHO project photometry database (astro-ph/0102262).
explanation: This paper reports the discovery of eight new R Coronae Borealis stars in the Large Magellanic Cloud using the MACHO project photometry database, making it the most relevant to the question.
evidence_quote: We report the discovery of eight new R Coronae Borealis
